# ðŸ“’ Developer style guide for Footer


## Themes for Footer ðŸ”½

1. White Footer

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/83635276/208016825-ded7cfe9-37c4-437d-8840-a4291a253cfc.png)

2. Light Blue Footer

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/83635276/208016904-f8413612-0f11-4a82-a1a9-23c93f06169c.png)

3. Dark Footer

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/83635276/208016967-e65b3e44-14a2-4400-b943-5de6abcaf047.png)

---

## General must known design system guideline :

### Color ðŸŽ¨

| Color | white | Light Blue | Dark |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Code in Tailwind | bg-white | bg-blue-600 | bg-slate-900 |


Color of `text` will depend on the `bg` color

| Background | Dark | Light Blue | white |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Text | White | White | Black |
| Code in Tailwind | text-white | text-white |  |

### Padding

Default padding will be used as `px-[183px]` and `py-[100px]`

### Font

For Footer font used are: 

- `font-serif`
- `font-semibold`
- `font-normal`

### Border Radius ðŸ”²

The normal border-radius for the components are `none`.

---

## Icon guidelines:

Mostly all the icons are taken from â†’ [Hero Icons](https://heroicons.com/)

`Icon-text-gap` :  We follow a convention of equal margin between the text and the icon as padding in y  axis `py`. and always the margin is given from the side of icon.

|  | Width | Type |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Small | w-4 & h-4 | Hero Icons mini |
| Medium | w-5 & h-5 | Hero Icons mini |
| Large | w-6 & h-6 | Hero Icons filled |

---

## Example of Footer ðŸ‘‡

### Here Is a Example of White Footer

This is the way we have white footer.

Like in the `/Footer/src/footer-white-15.html`.

Want to see this badges in action? Try copy pasting this code in [Tailwind Playground](https://play.tailwindcss.com/). ðŸ’¥

```html

  <div class="mx-auto mb-[51px] flex h-[280px] flex-col items-center justify-center gap-[20px] rounded-[10px] bg-[#0A142F] shadow-2xl lg:h-[200px] xl:flex-row xl:gap-[40px]">
    <span class="font-serif text-[22px] text-white sm:text-[32px]">Subscribe Newsletter</span>
    <div class="relative flex flex-col gap-5 lg:flex-row lg:gap-0">
      <input type="email" placeholder="Enter your email" class="h-[56px] w-[220px] rounded-[4px] pl-[24px] sm:w-[300px] md:w-[510px] lg:h-[72px]" />
      <button class="font-['Helvetica Neue'] top-[8px] right-[8px] h-[56px] rounded-[4px] bg-[#1855CB] font-[500] not-italic text-white lg:absolute lg:w-[180px]">Subscribe Now</button>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="flex flex-col items-center justify-between gap-7 xl:flex-row xl:gap-0">

      </a>

    </div>
  </div>
```

### Here Is a Example of Light Blue Footer

This is the way we have Light Blue footer.

Like in the `/Footer/src/footer-blue-15.html`.

Want to see this badges in action? Try copy pasting this code in [Tailwind Playground](https://play.tailwindcss.com/). ðŸ’¥

```html
<footer class="relative">
  <div class="absolute -z-10 w-full">
    <div class="h-24 w-full bg-blue-600"></div>
    <div class="flex flex-row">
      <div class="h-0 w-0 border-r-[200px] border-b-[60px] border-r-blue-600 border-b-transparent"></div>
      <div class="h-20 w-full rounded-3xl bg-blue-600">
        <div class="h-8 bg-blue-600"></div>
      </div>
      <div class="h-0 w-0 border-l-[200px] border-b-[60px] border-l-blue-600 border-b-transparent"></div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="px-[40px] pt-[109px] sm:px-[90px] lg:px-[183px]">
    <div
      class="mx-auto mb-[51px] flex h-[280px] flex-col items-center justify-center gap-[20px] rounded-[10px] bg-white shadow-2xl lg:h-[200px] xl:flex-row xl:gap-[40px]">
      <span class="font-serif text-[22px] sm:text-[32px]">Subscribe Newsletter</span>
      <div class="relative flex flex-col gap-5 lg:flex-row lg:gap-0">
        <input type="email" placeholder="Enter your email"
          class="h-[56px] w-[220px] rounded-[4px] pl-[24px] sm:w-[300px] md:w-[510px] lg:h-[72px] border border-black" />
        <button
          class="font-['Helvetica Neue'] top-[8px] right-[8px] h-[56px] rounded-[4px] bg-[#1855CB] font-[500] not-italic text-white lg:absolute lg:w-[180px]">Subscribe
          Now</button>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="flex flex-col items-center justify-between gap-7 xl:flex-row xl:gap-0">
      <div
        class="flex flex-wrap items-center justify-center gap-[20px] font-sans text-[16px] font-normal not-italic md:gap-[80px]">
        <a href="">About Us</a>
        <a href="">Discover</a>
        <a href="">Explore</a>
        <a href="">Books</a>
      </div>

        <a href="">

            </path>
          </svg>
        </a>
        <a href="">

            viewBox="0 0 16 16">

          </svg>
        </a>
```

### Here Is a Example of Dark Footer

This is the way we have dark footer.

Like in the `/Footer/src/footer-dark-15.html`.

Want to see this badges in action? Try copy pasting this code in [Tailwind Playground](https://play.tailwindcss.com/). ðŸ’¥
